# datapower_assemblyactionextract (Data Source)

Extract assembly action

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_assemblyactionextract" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_assemblyactionextract.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
